string_table:
I don't regret anything... Ech.
Have a nice... Stalker.
Hi. What are you selling?
Everything. Take your pick.
We should order some more...
Soon Dushman... Soon.
I want to join to the [Army].
Are you crazy? Do you even have the documents? How you dare? ...Although, okay, I know how to present it to my superiors. But it will cost you 10.000 hryvnias, and what do you want? This is the army son! So what are you going to do? Do you have any money?
Yeah, here you go.
No.
Well, then you'll never serve in our valiant army. Dismissed.
Okay, hmmm... Okay... Okay, the paperwork... and although, okay, you can consider you're in the army now. If I'm correct, I'll contact with my superiors. Dismissed. I do not see any joy on the face of a private. Now you are in the army!
Did you bring the money?
Are you drunk or something? Or you have amnesia? You are already in the army fool! Get out of here before I kick your ass.
I want to join the [Bandits]
If you start spitting, I'll think about it.
You got the money on you?
Yeah, here you go.
Not yet.
So why the fuck are you bothering me? Get the fuck out of here!
That's good. I'll talk for you, suckers are always welcome here. Go ahead.
What are you... Are you provoking me, bitch?
Hey, you need to be responsible about what you say.
Yeah, well, you're right, fucker.
Hmm... Aren't you afraid? Well, I need those kind of guys. In short, give me a dozen and I'll let you in.
...
Look, if you don't cooperate, we'll beat the shit out of you fast. You're already in a group. Go... Wash your face.
Here you go.
I don't have that much right now.
So why are you riding cotton here? Come back when they are.
Well, that's the solution. I'll go out with people. In the meantime, you go for a walk.
Well, what's up? Did you get the money?
Well, what's up? Did you get the money?
No, I changed my mind.
Well, then get out of here.
Okay, how much do you need?
Well, 20,000...
Are you fucking kidding me? What the...
Okay, then.
Shut the fuck up! Do you know with who you're dealing with? Another bitch with a word of gonorrhoea... I'll cut you on pieces.
Try it.
Come on, calm down! 20, ok, 20.
I want to join [Clear Sky]
Yeah, we need people, especially now when few of us are left. That trip to the nuclear power plant really dropped our numbers. But I just can't take you in, we need a contribution of 10 thousand. Are you ready?
Yeah, here you go.
I don't have that much.
I changed my mind.
So you're already in our group. Do you feel okay? Look at our doctor. Let him examine you.
It's settled. I'll let the others know. Welcome to Clear Sky.
Alas, I can't accept you without a fee.
When you're ready, come back.
I want to join [Duty].
The new recruit's contribution is 10,000. Mainly for the rations and the supplies of your future brothers. Do you have that much?
Yeah, here you go.
No, I don't have that much, maybe there are other options for joining? Without investment?
I changed my mind.
No. Come back when you get it.
...
Okay, now you belong to Duty. Remember our purpose.
You hit your head, didn't you? You're already in debt.
I want to join the [Scientists].
Yeah, we can take you into the junior field group, But due to bureaucratic delays we will need a contribution of 10 thousand hryvnias. Do you have this amount?
Yeah, here you go.
No.
Well, then I can't help you on this case.
Okay, I'll send in a request, it'll take some time, mainly because of the papers, but you can already be considered an employee. Have a nice day.
Well, well, well... Young man, you are already listed as an employee? There is no reason to ask again!
I want to join [Freedom]
Of course man! We are always happy to see new faces! Do you know the rules for joining us?
Don't worry! come back when you're ready. Peace, brother!
Hold this joint man! Welcome to Freedom! This is a personal fit for you from me! Come to the fire, warm up, brother, listen to the music. But remember, you have to fight for and with freedom!
You're rich, aren't you? A dozen with you?
Brother! Are you on the sky? Are you in this dimension? You're already with us, all right! Take a break, get your thoughts in order.
What are the rules?
It's just, man, I have to make some money. Not much. Understand, it is necessary. You know, I would accept everyone without any sums, but, it doesn't work that way.
How much are we talking about?
I changed my mind.
Oh, no problem! Come back when you change your mind again.
10,000, that's all it takes, no more hryvnias!
Here you go. Hold this.
I don't have that much right now.
I want to join the [Mercenaries].
Do you think you match? Why do you want to join?
I changed my mind.
Okay, I'll let people know about you. Remember my lesson. And don't forget who you obey. Dismissed.
You'll be back when you have the right amount of money. Dismissed.
Then I have nothing to talk to you about.
Okay, I'll let people know about you. In the meantime, you can go.
Come back when you are. We need such agents.
You got the money on you?
Ready to join us?
Did you hit your head? You're already one of us.
Yeah. Here you go.
Because... I...
Not yet.
Then why are you hanging around here? You have a task.
Yeah, here you go.
Not your business.
Shut up, you head of the gramophone. I don't think you're right for us. Because the key to our job is secrecy. You got a big mouth on you, bite it. Being a mercenary is about keeping secrets which only you and the customer will know. However, for a price, I'll overlook it, because I assume you've learned your lesson? 10,000, that's payment for your tongue. Pay it, and you'll be one of us. You got it?
That's right. Hehehe, I think you're right for us. Secrecy is just as important in our business as the accuracy of the order. It doesn't matter who is in front of you. The motive should only be with you and the customer. And every agent is impersonal. However, I can't accept you without an investment. 10 thousand is enough. Consider it an investment. You will earn much more with us.
Yeah, I get it. Here you go.
I agree with you. Here you go.
Yeah, I get it. But I don't have that much.
I agree, but I don't have that much yet.
I want to become a [Loner].
You do realize this isn't free, right?
Come back when you change your mind.
Are you drunk or something? You're already a loner.
I understand that. How much do you want for your trouble?
Ten, that'll be enough.
Here you go.
I don't have that much...
Then come back when you get it.
Oh, there you go! A business man. I'll get in touch with the right people, you can go. Loner.
No, I changed my mind.
I want to join [Monolith]
Yeah, I know. Yes... But I have to take away 10 thousand from you... That's what he wants. It is His will. You have the money, right?
Yeah. Here you go.
No.
So it's not time yet, don't rush things. Come when the right time comes.
Yeah, that's the moment. I greet you in our ranks, neophyte. Go, go and carry His will!
Is this the moment? Do you have the money?
The monolith tests me... I know who you are. You are one of us. Go ahead, I have passed the test.
Come on! I'm ready.
Here you go, self murderer.
[Click on trigger]
Wow... Bitch! Okay, you're lucky this time.
...
Again? Well, here's the suicide boy.
No, fuck it. I changed my mind.
Pussy... Come back when you grow some balls.
Do you sell anything?
I'm sick of everything, want a drink?
Yeah, I'm sick of everything too, come on.
When you drink, you need to know the measure. Otherwise you can drink less than you need. Let's drink to the measure! To the measure of everything!
Hurry up!
*Hic* My... *Hic* Throat, fuch... Well, let's have another one, because it didn't break!
Ooh, bastard. Repeat?
Oh, I'm warming up! One more?
Eh! It's good! I should thank you. There's a rule in the zone, whoever gets you drunk or fed you, you're supposed to thank him. Or the zone won't forgive you. You'll get punished. Well, look, here's some of my stuff, it's yours now. Good luck, stalker.
Oh, shit, that's fucked up! My legs buckled... Ugh, I don't feel so good. Breathe in, breathe out... I feel better now. No, I don't know how to drink, no matter how hard I try, I feel like shit and then I start talking... I even got robbed like that once, can you believe it? We had a few drinks and a chat and I told the "drinking buddy" that I hide all sorts of shit in a very interesting place... It's really interesting! No one's gonna find it, I've been there... Open the map... This is where I saw I could hide my backpack, so it's lying there. Who knows when it might come in handy... Hey, do you have any more? No, that's enough for today, my head's not thinking straight.
All right, that's enough.
I don't think so. Give me everything you've got. I'll kill you anyway, I'll take it myself.
What's up, man? Have you been drinking too much?
No, I'm on a raid soon.
Well, that's enough, that's enough, come on.
Oh, yeah! Well, shall we continue?
Ah, sorry. I thought we'd have a good time.
Pray, bitch.
...
Let's focus.
Are you out of your fucking mind? I'm gonna...
I'm sorry, I... I can't, it's not me.
Ooh, that went well, mate, thank you! When I think back... It brings tears to my eyes... À? I had a friend, may he rest in peace. He used to pour vodka like this, it was always good, just like now... Listen, I stashed his stuff in a safe place. Let me mark it on the map, whatever you find is yours. All right, I'm having a flashback, I need to be alone. See you later, stalker.
Ugh, bitch, I've missed this.
I don't drink with anyone.
Eh... Come on, one more... It's not good that it's like that.
... You know, let it be you. Here are the coordinates for you. There's what I have left... They are already following me anyway. Here's a little bit more for you, but still love money, huh? Eh, it's time to die.
Oh, you made me happy! Listen, I was sitting here recently by the fire, so the stalkers were whispering about stashed loot, let me show you on the map. You... that, don't worry, they disappeared after a day, went for artifacts and haven't returned. And what real stalker would talk in front of everyone about his stash? I'm not going in there myself, so you know what... Be careful if you go in there, it could be an ambush... I've had enough alcohol for one day, take care of yourself.
Thank you, but what are you talking about?
Whatever, remember one thing. Never mess with Badger. He seems immortal. Now get out of here, I need to be alone, goodbye stalker. Remember my words and take care of yourself.
So long.
Wow, bitch, that's making me cry... What kind of drink is that? Let's do it again?
Ah, I'm gonna have a drink, I'm gonna live right away! Ha-ha! Let's have another one, shall we?
I'm not feeling well... But this is not a reason to stop! Will it get better now, let's do it again?
Do you know why man is the most perfect creature in the animal kingdom? Because he assigns himself places in this classification... You know what I mean? So here's to man's sanity!
Hold it.
Great! Well, without clinking glasses!
You can't drink alone, let's drink collectively. To the great power of the collective!
Here's to always having a light heart and heavy pockets!
May there be people in your life you want to drink to, not people who make you want to get drunk! To friends!
We'll blame those who aren't there!
God gave us a day to drink, but nobody knows what day it is. So let's drink every day so we don't miss it!
Vodka is our enemy. But we are not afraid of enemies, we are eradicating them.
Wow... Nice to see you, heh - heh, I've learned in practice... People, they're like trees - they fall to the ground after three to four hits with an axe. Pour it, we haven't finished.
Um ... What was that? You know, recently in the morning at the cordon three attentive stalkers found one inattentive. On the branches ... And a little over the territory. Let's have another drink to, attentiveness?
Can it go free? Look, laughter, as you know, prolongs life, and drugs, on the contrary, reduce it... In general, that's what it comes out to, but it's more fun... So?
I changed my mind.
What?
Don't you understand? I said pour it, or I'll blow your head off now.
You'd calm down, fucking hero.
Oh, bitch, you asked for it.
Come on, just yesterday I was so pissed I'm still seeing crows everywhere...
Drink? If you're offering, pour!
Whoever's looking for strength in vodka walks on the edge of the grave. Have you heard this? But if you treat me, I won't refuse!
Do you have the booze with you?... Ugh, what am I doing? I'm going on a raid with the men. Sorry, but some other time.
Drink? Why not drink? Recently I was told that there was some special vodka in the Zone, diggers dug it up near the NPP, and... Oh, right, pour it!
Yes, I don't even know you, how do I know what you're stirring up?
Stalker's fate, that's how it is, the inconsolable thirst, the eternal pursuit. Let's drink to the success of our hopeless work!
Whoa, that's an unexpectedly pleasant turn of events! Let's drink a little bit, or maybe more.
You know... I left a friend to die... But, if I otherwise tried to help him, we would have died. Let's at least remember.
Uh... Hehe... Had a shot... I had two, and my head started rattling. I've had two... What am I talking about? Ah! Let's have another one, shall we?
Wow... Do you know how to prevent hangovers? Don't be sober! Let's tip over again!
Eh... Drinking, drinking, drinking... You know, alcohol doesn't help to find answers, it helps to forget questions. And I have a lot of questions... And in the zone they just added... Shall we repeat?
Khee... That's why you think everyone at the bar is so relaxed? That's because alcohol kills nerve cells. Only the quiet ones are left. So what else can we drain?
Whoo! As my grandfather used to say: "The mood is zero? Hello, strong alcohol" Still there?
Eh... I woke up today from the cold and smiled, thinking, "She's the one who pulled the bedspread over, as usual. And then I realized the fire was out... That' s all right, I'll be home soon. Soon... What are you looking at? Keep going.
Kha-*hic*! I said to myself this morning, "I'll get drunk! And so... I was drunk! I like to set goals and reach them. But that doesn't mean it's time to stop! Shall we continue?
Uh... You know, I joined AA not too long ago... I'm in my second week of drinking and I don't even know who I'm with... You're in the club too, aren't you? Okay, I remember the first rule... Oops. Anyway, let's keep going!
The savior of the hungry man doesn't know... Drunk sober doesn't understand... Hence the conclusion: drink, eat - and you will understand! Let's drink for the understanding! A hungry man does not comprehend a hungry man... The drunk does not understand the sober... Hence the conclusion: Have a drink, have a snack and you'll be understood! Here's to understanding!
As you get older, your memory changes, your eyesight changes, even your loved one changes, and only alcohol stays the same. To alcohol!
Here's to the Airborne! I mean, here's to Faith, Valour and Luck!
They say a losing streak sometimes turns out to be an upswing. So let's drink to our joyless perspectives on the runway!
Vodka is abomination, vodka is poison! But a shot won't hurt! Especially to us.
Let's drink to the success of our hopeless cause! To the luck that can turn everything in our favor!
I'll be short. Let's drink to... I want to!
Slow and frowning, we're sitting dopey. To revive life in us, we need a shot!
To make sure the day goes by, you have to drink the stops!
Let us have as much sadness as we have left in the glass!
Lift up the cups for full pockets!
We'll blame the people on board. Who is overboard will drink himself!
All is fine, amazing if you drink it beforehand.
Let's drink... In one gulp!
What's with the detector?
Got it, give me the rest and take it.
Heh, what am I supposed to wait for you to collect the money? 24 hours. I'll wait 24 hours and then I'll take your detector for the cost of repairs.
Well, that's great! Someone here already wants to take your detector. I'm waiting 24 hours, and he gives more than you. Do you understand?
Oh, fuck you. I got such a message from the out land today! So here's your detector, here's your booze! Get out of here!
Bitch... You're such a pain in the ass, you're such a bunch of empty promises, but what's the point? Listen to me, I'll give you 24 hours. I'll take your detector and it's over.
And what do we mark?
Yes, it's none of your business! Don't find out, Redfinger! Ha-ha! Drink to my health! Oh, good life!
I already told you everything. Look for money.
Well, go check it out.
Shit... No matter how much I bother with this shit. Ready, working. The rest of my blood was drank by this bitch.
Shit... In short, firewood to him. I was tempted, he was dead at the end. Hold on to your piece of metal, it can't be fixed anymore.
The detector's okay, did you bring the money?
Turn around... Shoot.
Horseshit... Are you sure you can't fix it anymore?
And the prepayment?
Yes, that's all, it's cheaper to order a new one than to fix it. Was it thrown into the electric circuit? Instead of a bolt?
Cheers.
Are you crazy? I've spent so much time on it, and you're gonna talk to me for pre-payment? Are you drunk or what? I took it from you by god!
Okay, okay. Be my guest.
So you broke it down!
You're a fucker, aren't you? Are the shores all messed up? Did you call me a stupid? I told you that, I will try to fix it, nothing that you can't do anyway! Get the fuck out of here while you're alive! Or they'll take you away!
This is the rest. I hope it's working...
I don't have any money right now.
Oh, how... When I asked you about the cost of repairs, what were you thinking? Anyway, you have 24 hours, if I don't see my money, you won't see your detector. Free.
Conditions you know.
What's with the detector?
Got it, give me the rest and take it.
Heh, what am I supposed to wait for you to scrape up? A day. I will wait 24 hours, and then kick your detector for the amount of repair.
Well, that's great! Someone here already wants to take your detector. I'm waiting 24 hours, and he gives more than you. Smeke?
Oh, fuck you. I got such a message from the big land today! So here's your detector, here's your booze! Get out of here!
Sooka... How did you get the fuck out of it, you're not going to make any moves at all, you promise, but you're not going to do any good? In short, listen here, I give you 24 hours. Pina is your detector, and it's over.
And what do we mark?
Yes, it's none of your business! Don't find out, Redfinger! Ha-ha! Drink to my health! Oh, good life! Good...
I already told you everything. Look for money.
Well, go check it out.
Holly shit... No matter how much I bother with this shit. Ready, working. The rest of my blood was drank by the bitch.
Shit... In short, firewood to him. I was tempted, he was dead at the end. Hold on to your piece of metal, it can't be fixed anymore.
The detector's okay, did you bring the money?
Turn around... Shoot.
Horseshit... Are you sure you can't fix it anymore?
And the prepayment?
Yes, that's all, it's cheaper to order a new one than to fix it. Was it thrown into the electric circuit? Instead of a bolt?
Behave.
Are you crazy? I've spent so much time on it, and you're gonna talk to me for pre-payment? Are you drunk or what? I took it from you by god!
Okay, okay. Be my guest.
So you broke it down!
You're a fucker, aren't you? Are the shores all messed up? Did you call me a fucking bitch? I told you I'd try to fix it, not that it would happen anyway! Get the fuck out of here while you're at it! Otherwise they'll take the bitch away!
This is the rest. I hope it's working...
I don't have any money right now.
Oh, how... When I asked you about the cost of repairs, what were you thinking? Anyway, you have 24 hours, if I don't see my money, you won't see your detector. Free.
Conditions you know.
I have an unusual business for you.
Well, let's talk about it.
Well, No, what the hell are you doing? Where'd you get the money from?
Well, you don't want to, I just feel better.
Heh-heh... Faced with such, galimaya is a job. But I think we can fix it. Sometimes it turns out... In short, drive 8310 UAH and I take it, it's a prepayment, and a complete repair will cost you 23750 UAH. Do you agree?
Okay, take it, let me know when you're ready. I am in touch.
No, I changed my mind.
Hey, Orca, are you fucked up or something?
Go to bed, you're drunk.
No, what the fuck! I'm just interested in the shit! ...Get the hell out of here, asshole.
Yeah, I thought so, people like you don't have the usual stuff.
This jerk...
Talk, what have you got there?
Look what's there, but it looks pretty lousy. Will you take it?
Ooh, no, there's no point in trying. Throw it away, or give it to scientists at the worst.
Are you kidding me? It's scrap metal. Who do you think I am?
You may also believe in Santa Claus? I'm not a wizard, I'm not a wizard, you can't get anything out of this junk.
Bloody mysterious, let's get to the bottom of it.
Look what's there, but it's not a hype. See if you can take it?
What did you bring in?
A "Echo"
A "Bear"
Heh heh... Been there, it's a shitty job. But I think it can be fixed. Sometimes it works... In short, charge 3750 UAH and I'll do it, it's a prepayment, and the full repair will cost you 10700 UAH. Agreed?
Okay, take it, let me know when you're ready. I am in touch.
I don't have that much for you.
I'm listening.
No, it's too expensive.
Come back when you have enough money.
Yes, I can see the fault, not a complicated one. I can fix it, but it won't be free. 8310 UAH to start with. When the repair is finished, you'll give me the rest. ...And yes, the total cost of the repair is 23750 UAH. Do you agree?
Okay. I'll leave it with you and let me know when it's ready. I'll be in touch.
No, I changed my mind.
That's your decision.
Come back when you're ready.
Is it possible to fix it?
No. The damage is too severe. It will cost you more to repair than to order a working one.
No, it's no longer recoverable.
The device is not working, right?
Show.
A "Echo"
A "Bear" a
Yes, I see a malfunction without laying it down. I can fix it, but it will not be free. 3750 UAH For starters. Upon completion of the repair you will give me the rest. ...And yes, the total cost of repair is 10700 UAH. Agree?
Okay. I leave it to you to let me know when it's ready. I am in touch.
Is the Detector ready?
Yes, did you bring the rest?
Find the money.
If you need to fix it, come on over, I'll help.
The detector is ready, and the money is ready?
Turn around.
Yes, here's the money.
I don't have any money right now.
Okay, come when you have enough...
Is the Detector ready?
Yes, did you bring the rest?
Find the money.
If you need to fix it, come and see.
The detector is ready, and the money is ready?
Turn around.
Yes, here's the money.
I don't have any money right now.
Okay, come when you have enough...
What's with the detector?
Your detector is ready. Did you bring the rest?
I already told you everything. Look for money.
If you need to fix it, come on over, I'll help.
The detector's okay, did you bring the money?
Turn around.
Yes, here's the money.
I don't have any money right now.
Hmm. Okay. As soon as you get the money, come. But don't take too long. Because the interest will flow for the content of your detector. I'm kidding. I'll put it in the inventory. And that's me, I'm not kidding. You have 24 hours.
What's with the detector?
Your detector is ready. Did you bring the rest?
I already told you everything. Look for money.
If you need to fix it, come and see.
The detector's okay, did you bring the money?
Turn around.
Yes, here's the money.
I don't have any money right now.
Hmm. Okay. As soon as you get the money, come. But don't take too long. Because the interest will flow for the content of your detector. I'm kidding. I'll put it in the inventory. And that's me, I'm not kidding. You have 24 hours.
I have something unusual for you to do.
And what's it?
No, it's too expensive.
How do you say...
Uh-huh... So, yes, I see the cause of the breakdown. I can fix it, but it won't be free. 8310 UAH To start with. At the end of the repair you will give me the rest. ...And yes, the total cost of the repair is 23750 UAH. Do you agree?
All right, take it, let me know when it's ready. I'll be in touch.
No, I changed my mind.
Stop distracting me.
When you have a clear thought in your head, then come.
Why are you so uncertain...
It doesn't work a damn thing! Is it possible to fix it?
Unfortunately. There is very serious damage here, it will cost more to repair than to order a new one from us.
No, I have to admit it's scraps.
No, it's no longer recoverable.
It doesn't work a damn thing!
Show me what you got there?
An "Echo" detector.
A "Bear" detector.
Uh-huh... So, yes, I see the cause of the breakdown. I can fix it, but it won't be free. 3750 UAH To start with. At the end of the repair, you will give me the rest. ...And yes, the total cost of the repair is 10700 UAH. Do you agree?
All right, take it, let me know when it's ready. I'll be in touch.
I have something unusual for you to do.
Spread the word.
Intrigued, tell me.
I'm not wizard, but let's hear what's up.
What makes you think I'm interested in it?
What did you break this time?
Look at the detector, I think it's broken.
A detector? No, I don't do that sort of thing. It's not a rewarding job, go to the scientists, they have a technician who deals with this stuff.
No, I don't fix detectors.
A detector? No, I'm not going to do that. You should go to a scientist. That's what they do there.
Well, not anymore, I don't have the patience for a second time.
No stalker, I won't even try to fix that. It's a very delicate job. Go to the scientists, they have a place and the necessary equipment.
Another time, I changed my mind.
Sidorovich, open the door!
Get out of here.
No, I changed my mind about killing them.
...Free.
This is done, keep the PDA.
Great, give it to me.
Why do you need them?
It's none of your business, stalker... Here's your reward, if there's any more work, I'll write to you.
Whatever you say.
Hi, what's your business with me?
This world is full of evil stalker... I need your help. I got word that two brothers, Shilo and Hook, showed up on the swamps. Get me their PDA.
That's a shame, so I'm wrong about you.
On the swamps, so... The swamps are big, can you be more specific?
Yes, of course. They came from the Agroprom, so look for them on the outskirts near the crossing. They wouldn't go far, they don't want to face Clear Sky.
What do I get for these PDAs?
About 10 thousand hryvnias and medicines.
Okay, I'll do it.
No, I'm not interested.
Something I don't like about the way you're fucking around tonight, honey, I'd like to see you...
Where does this cardboard fool go? It's been two hours now, or did you decide to starve to death?
Your water pump? Look, man, I don't have time for you, back off.
Why, does the water pump work? Oh, I don't mind, the water's expensive nowadays.
And how does it not work? Do you hear that the pump is malfunctioning? I'm just looking for a rank. The water is as clean as a child's tear.
Well, I will.
Heh, keep it in mind.
No, I'm on another occasion.
I mean, I'm watching you, son. And I don't have salt in my cartridges.
Okay, okay.
Hello, Stalker, what are you doing here?
Ah, you bitch! He doesn't have time! Isha what you're thinking! I'm gonna get you now...
Sit tight, old man...
Hello. I'm here on my own business, and who are you?
What kind of business can you have on my water pump? Ish, you young people, he has things to do! Come here as if you were at home, do you know how many of my own men shoot with my own guns? Huh?
Calm down, man, I'm not mad!
Well, if that's the case... Look at me. I've been here for a long time, the locals know me. Ask me what I do with business. So what do you need? Did you come for water?
Eh... My knees hurt again... A Blowout is soon.
Nothing Maria Kuzminichna, but I'll see you soon...
Shhh... Wailing... Hungry, creatures.
Hello Mikhalych! Is there anything to fill the bottle?
Oh, yeah! Ready for half a thousand. What do you need to fill?
Why are you messing with my head? Get out!
Barman! Got some water?
Yes, get 500 hryvnias ready. What do you want to fill up?
How only does this land carry...? Get out of here while you're still in one piece.
Hey fellas, pour some water.
Give me 500 UAH, where do you want it? He-he...
Hey, do you hear me, fuck off, fucking hoodlum!
Hi, Professor, I need water.
It will cost you 500 UAH. Got anything to pour into?
Leave me alone.
Hello, pour me some water.
500 UAH. Where do you want it?
Leave me alone.
A Plastic bottle.
A Thermo.
A Olive flask.
A Dark flask.
A Metal flask.
A Glass bottle.
A Bottle of glass.
A beer bottle.
I changed my mind.
I need to charge my batteries.
No problem, what do you have there?
A Battery of 4000mAH
It's gonna cost 1000 and you're gonna have to wait a little bit, okay?
It's gonna cost 3000 and you're gonna have to wait a little bit, okay?
Here it is, I hope I don't have to wait forever.
A Battery of 4200mAH
A Battery of 4500mAH
A Battery of 100V AM1
I changed my mind, maybe later.
As you wish, but I've got that all busy here.
Klin, can we talk?
Ahem... Your conversations are your... Okay, still no work yet. What do you want?
Tell me about the weapons disassembly.
Well, disassembling weapons is probably the easiest thing. Stalkers use everything that comes in handy, different sets of tools, even cutlery is used, but remember, disassemble everything carefully. Then, spare parts are used in to repair or you can sell them, I collect good samples.
Tell me something about self made cartridges.
Yes, also an interesting topic. Recently, traders have all sorts of kits for making cartridges, but any homemade ammunition will be worse than the factory one. Usually here they use tools for making a cartridge and materials for them. All this can be bought from traders. I can't tell you more about it further, because each set has its own instructions. Well, you will read it, it is not difficult to understand there.
And what else can you do with your handy items?
Heh... Turn your head. What else can i do? Here in the Zone in general, a lot of things are done with our own hands. Rags and vodka are bandages. We sew sleeping bags and backpacks, materials and tools for which almost any trader has. Joints and blunts also can be made from improvised materials, but it is more often seen in Freedom. Yes, even here it is possible to collect a barrel, and without my help, the main thing is to work with my head.
The wedge, what do you need to assemble a weapon?
So, depending on what you want to collect, I say at once, I collect not all, but different calibers. Look around me, this isn't a factory, so the quality will be outdated. And the parts I use are mostly outdated. There is no new use for new parts, I will not build a new one anyway, so save it for another.
Okay, what parts do I need?
\n%c[0,188,124,42]-9x18mm,9x19mm,0.45 ACP,7.62x25mm%c[default] - A handle, spring and trigger.\n%c[0,188,124,42]-9x39mm,5.45x39mm,5.56x45mm,7.62x39mm,7.62x51 NATO%c[default] - barrel 9x39/5.45x39/7.62mm, handle, spring, trigger, stock, bolt.\n%c[0,188,124,42]-7.62x54mm%c[default] - barrel 7.62mm,handle, spring, trigger, stock, bolt.\n%c[0,188,124,42]-7.92x33mm%c[default] - barrel 7.92mm, spring, trigger, stock, bolt.\n%c[0,188,124,42]-12x70mm%c[default] single-barrel - shotgun barrel, stock and trigger.\n%c[0,188,124,42]-12x70mm%c[default] double-barreled - double shotgun barrel, double trigger, and a stock.
Tell me about the barrel replacement.
And that's it?
Of course not. Besides this junk, I need money for my work. And also the tools. \n\n\n%c[0,188,124,42]9x18mm%c[default] - 200UAH, \n%c[0,188,124,42]9x19mm%c[default] - 350UAH, \n%c[0,188,124,42]9.39mm%c[default] - 1000UAH, \n%c[0,188,124,42]0.45 ACP%c[default] - 450UAH, \n%c[0,188,124,42]5.45x39mm%c[default] - 700UAH, \n%c[0,188,124,42]5.56x45mm%c[default] - 850UAH, \n%c[0,188,124,42]7.62x25mm%c[default] - 500UAH, \n%c[0,188,124,42]7.62x39mm%c[default] - 750UAH, \n%c[0,188,124,42]7.62x51mm%c[default] - 700UAH, \n%c[0,188,124,42]7.62x54mm%c[default] - 1400UAH, \n%c[0,188,124,42]7.92x33mm%c[default] - 900UAH, \n%c[0,188,124,42]12x70mm%c[default] - 220UAH.
Got it.
I know all this, Klin, this isn't my first day here.
Then I have nothing to talk to you about.
The gun barrel is a delicate thing. To replace it you need to have two things: the barrel itself and a set for its replacement. As a rule, the barrel is either bought or extracted from the weapon by a special set of tools corresponding to its application. There are three types. As well as in the case of disassembly of clothes on the receipt of component parts affects the subject, its condition and your skills. I also want to add that when disassembling rusty, obsolete and new weapons, the final parts will correspond to the quality of it... Rusty or dirty barrels will not work, so they will need to be cleaned and cleaned. They clean the barrels with different means: gasoline, kerosene, vodka, water, solvents, cleaning kits and many others. Replacement kits are different, that is, for each caliber has its own set. Basically, these field kits can be found with traders. By the way, not every weapon and caliber can be replaced by a barrel, this also take into account.
Tell me about the suit disassembly.
Well, the suits are not difficult to disassemble, the main thing here is precision. They are mainly disassembled in sets, they are sold by traders. More advanced equipment is disassembled only with the help of appropriate tools available. There are three types of tools for such work. The number of received components also depends on personal skills and the state of the object to be disassembled... All the important details are cut out of the costumes, the rest is thrown away, because here, in the Zone, there is no use from such trifles. Then they repair their equipment or sell the obtained parts. Certain things made of fabric such as Balaklavas or simple clothes like jackets, as well as some of their components can be disassembled with a knife. The number of components that can be produced depends on the strength of the object to be disassembled and personal skills. Also, as a rule, disassemble only those suits from which there is something to get. For example, on jackets or raincoats makes no sense even to spend their time and money, and on the disassembly of exoskeletons, well... that's the source of income.
Tell me about the suit repair.
In the field, suits can also be repaired in a homemade way, of course, but it is possible. Almost everything from rags to heavy armour plates is used in reparation. The consumables themselves will not be glued to the costume, so you still need something that can be organized to sew the whole thing. There are sets for sewing and reparations, there can be something else. And the consumables are also important. It is better to use high-quality materials, than garbage, because it can all cost more than the equipment. Glue, sewing and repair kits can be bought from traders. Consumables can be obtained by yourself, for example, from disassembly of suits, or also bought from traders. It is worth noting that each outfit has its own repair kits with appropriate restrictions. If the condition of the equipment is below the capabilities of the kit, repair is not possible. Also, each repair kit improves the condition of the object, but using additional components specified in the kit, it is possible to achieve a better repair.
Tell me about the weapons reparation.
Weapons in the zone are difficult and expensive to keep in good condition. Repair by a professional is expensive, so you have to use improvised means to take care of your weapon on a regular basis. To repair guns, just like to repair suits, you need consumables and repair kits. All the parts can be bought from traders or get them yourself, for example, many stalkers disassemble the barrels with hand and repair them themselves.
No doubt, kill them.
It's done, time to return to father George
So, swamps outskirts... Bring 2 PDA's.
Whoever's looking, he'll find it.
So I found the stash, it's time to get the promised reward.
Yeah, that's a good tip. Look for the wind in the field...
No, I couldn't find the coordinates.
If they were more accurate, I'd go myself. Okay, sometimes... Not every day is a holiday, right? Go sit by the fire and rest. If I have new coordinates I will inform you.
Behave.
Damn it... Okay. No problem. I'll let you know the new coordinates, but in the meantime, I need to get in touch with someone.
Bad... Bad. Okay, well, things happen. If there are new coordinates, I will beacon you.
I found it. Here you go.
Excellent! One less headache. Give me your backpack.
Hell, what the hell's the gravity, Fanatic, what's inside?
Don't ask. I will not answer... I see you're good, maybe I might even trust you with something important, but not now. Here you have, from me personally. I will write when there is a job. And it's time for me to clean up this shit...
Okay, Fanatic, if you say.
Fanatic, why don't you explain what's inside?
Not now stalker, not now. Here you have, from me personally. And if there will be more coordinates I will inform you.
Behave, Fanatic.
Well, at least you make me happy today! Show me what you found.
You're the one who's doing great. I like it when everything works out properly.
Don't you want to tell me what's inside?
Great... Great! Look, you don't need to know this, you'll sleep better. By the way, here's a little present for you from Fanatic. Heh-heh. Don't get lost stalker.
Good luck, Fanatic.
Howdy Fanatic, do you have the coordinates?
Yes, there is. Will you do it?

What kind of work do you suggest?
Mm-hmm. Mm-hmm. I'll try briefly. I'll give you a place to look for something. Asking no unnecesary questions. If you found it, you are the first guy in the village, praise be to you, honor and half the kingdom in addition! It's ironic, you can take away your grin. I will give you a fee. And further cooperation. I haven't found, well, there are times like this. If I don't worry, I give everyone a second chance. Questions?
And if I don't find it?
You're not getting anything. But you should try to find it. More questions?
No, I'm not interested.
Well, as you know, you're not someone else.
I can handle it. Let's get started.
No, let's get started.
What do I get for running?
Around 10 thousand hryvnias. And something else, by the circumstances.
That's good... But not so fast. I've already sent a good boy to search, I don't have other coordinates yet, two can't look for one thing without getting hurt, and I'm not going to put you two to search it to find out the best one. I will inform you. Be in touch.
Okay, come on.
What am I gonna look for?
Well, it's mostly a backpack. Heavy. Do not look inside. Just bring it to me. I don't know what will happen if you look inside, but it's no good, are you ready to take that risk?
Oppa, hello! Looked at your face tell me you're experienced one. What's the matter, or so, why did you came at my camp?
Snow fell at night ... A torn pillow of the moon ... Stars of discos ... Boulders on the city.
Wow... Okay, go for it, you bastard...
Where's the fool in there? It's a foolish thing to do.
Eh... Well, who if not me? Huh?
Yeah, you bitches aren't enough... Ah? Hello! What did you come with?
So they could be here, here, here, and perhaps here... Ah, not here anymore. It's like drinking...
Eh... Now to the city. The ass in the car, and at night... Eh...
How did you...? Is everything okay... Who knows?
Oppa! New faces! Hello! What, you just got to the Cordon, huh? Well, settle in! We're glad to see everyone here! But just remember who's come to us with the sword... From sword will die! Oh, relax! I was just warning you.
Heh... Hello. Yes, I'm new here.
Ah, so if you want to take a little tour, young fighter courses, so to speak. I'm Fanatic, I'm here to look after the rookies. I help with advice, I plant my work, it's not my first year here. Do you have vodka? Maybe we can tip over a couple of glasses so?
Thanks for the warm welcome, but another time.
Well, another time it's like that, but you take a vodka with you, okay?
Full of light. Who are you?
I am? I'm Fanatic and I keep an eye on the youngsters. I throw them jobs, but I have jobs for the experienced ones as well.
Okay, I'll take it into account. Be my guest.
Wait, why don't we slam a drink for dating?
Not until now.
Well, no problem. Well, you're the one who shouldn't neglect it in the zone.
Okay, come on.
I will.
Clap!
Wow, good. Well, come and see if you're a good guy, as I see it.
Obligatory, you're good too!
Hmm, why not? Come on! I have just that!
Excellent! I see you know a lot about good acquaintances!
Clap!
Eh... The bastard, it got really hot. What are you holding it for? Drink up, or it will cool down!
For luck!
For health!
For peace in the world!
For Sidorovich!
For yourself and for Sashka!
Oh, I see you're still alive?
Yeah, let's slam it.
What do you smell there? I have nothing.
Where's it goin'on, here, one at a time?
Yes, I don't have anything.
What the fuck... Where are they digging this shit from?
Me, how did you managed to kill all the servos?
Where are my files? Tools? What kind of shithole is this? How the fuck I'm gonna find shit!
What kind of asshole gives a rusty gun.
Ah, I'd have a normal key... Okay, I can do it anyway.
Ah... It's you.
Wow! Fuck... So without fingers can be left.
Who the hell are you?
I'm a Stalker, and you're a local Technician here, right?
One more... Yeah, you want me to fix you up or something?
There you go again... Well? What do you want?
Hmm, it's weird...
Ah, someday I'll get to Pripyat...
Uh, how's Mom? Sis?
I wish I had a dog, too. Doc tamed a pseudo dog once,I wish I had a little one.
Soldiers are shooting again, just so they don't come to us.
I wish Klin could teach me how to assemble guns, because we'd be faster together.
I'm tired... And where to go? There's death everywhere.
Man, my jacket's torn... Well, at least it's still in one piece.
...bitch, you'll remember me. You'll remember me again.
Eh, Psycho. Sorry you left us.
Ah? What?
Wasn't that enough?
Nothing...
Hey, what are you doing here?
Yeah, I'm waiting. Anyway, it's none of your business, man. Go your own way, while you still can.
Okay, what's your name?
Grisha.
Okay, come on.
Well, nice to meet you, Grisha.
Yeah, well... You'd better turn to the Fanatic, wouldn't you...
We're out of meds...
We have to find more, how can you get short on drugs?
Again, all hands are covered in blood ...
It's so quiet, my heart is so slow, I... Ahem... Looks like the dose... Exceeded.
Hello, Stalker. Do you need help?
What the... Can't I just pray in peace now?
I'm sorry. The body is weak. Forgive me.
What do you want? I just washed my hands...
Why "Father George"?
I used to serve the church.
Okay... I will take that into account.
How can you help?
I can give you medical help.
Are you a medic?
I have some medical knowledge.
I need help.
I know.
Your body doesn't need treatment. But your soul...
I can't afford it.
May God help us.
I'll do what I can, the rest is up to God.
Sorry. Come to God.
Well, you know what you're waiting for?
You have a choice, son. I can heal your wounds, and I can save you the radiation. But I will not do it for free. Treatment of wounds will cost you 2500 hryvnia. And the radiation treatment is 3000. What do you choose?
Heal me.
Spare me the radiation.
